      • get

        public static <T,N extends NestableData<N>> T get(N item,
                                                  String path)
        XPath-like method for getting the value of a nested relation's attribute. 

         
 String lang = DataUtils.get(item, "describes[0]/languageCode"));
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type to fetch
        Parameters:
        item - the item
        path - a path string
        Returns:
        a property of type T

      • set

        public static <T,N extends NestableData<N>> N set(N item,
                                                  String path,
                                                  T value)
        Xpath-like method for creating a new item by updating a nested relation of an existing item. 

         
 Bundle newBundle = DataUtils.set(oldBundle, "hasDate[0]/startDate", "1923-10-10");
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of property being set
        Parameters:
        item - the item
        path - a path string
        value - the value being set
        Returns:
        the item with the property at the given path set

      • setItem

        public static <N extends NestableData<N>> N setItem(N item,
                                                    String path,
                                                    N newItem)
        Xpath-like method for creating a new item by updating a nested relation of an existing item. 

         
 Bundle dateBundle = ...
 Bundle newItem = DataUtils.setItem(oldBundle, "hasDate[0]", dateBundle);

        Use an index of -1 to create a relationship set or append to an existing one.

        Parameters:
        item - the item
        path - a path string
        newItem - the new item to set at the path
        Returns:
        a item with the given item set at the given path

      • getRelations

        public static <N extends NestableData<N>> List<N> getRelations(N item,
                                                               String path)
        Xpath-like method to fetch a set of nested relations. 

         
 List<Bundle> dates = DataUtils.getRelations(item, "hasDate");
        Parameters:
        item - the item
        path - a path string
        Returns:
        a list of bundles at the given relationship path
